sentence: The best element is the PEOPLE they run all these they are always smiling eye contact and recognize and service you wherever you are in the hotel my family and I are members in this Hotel for 1 year now and we really spend enjoyable and fun time there during the summer and whenever it ’s sunny in winter days
I stayed here 5 nights while on a business trip office reserved this hotel for me
We stayed here during our stopover on the way back from our vacations

We love to go to Mariot Hotel because the Mexican Restaurant witch if fantastic me and my family really always have a fantastic evening with life music at the saidthe Mexican life music is fantastic and the food to nad some time we go to the disco to just beside the hotel
Wonderful Stay with Family Enjoyed the Pool this is the best best pool
A good place to hangout with family and friends
IN my next trip I will surely stay in some other hotel but will visit for the steakhouse
Great for a weekend outing with family
My family is grateful to the hotel management for a very comfortable stay
It was a busy week due to Eid holidays but I only noted two managers on duty across the platforms
I had encountered a few issues since my arrival to Mariot Doha Hotel where I intended to stay with my family for 2 nights
I had booked room to spend this weekend with my family unfortunately rom is available at 4 PM
It seems like a destination for many interim travels but also folks having a staycation
To cut the intro short my family and I had waited for at least an hour before our room number and key was given
When we reach our room it was a connecting room since my family was with me the other room was still being cleaned so we just waited until they finish

Then guess what when we were resting due to the long waiting was playing with my kid in the bed and sudendly i saw a hair underneath the pillow which for sure not from any of my family since we just came in
I spent 2 trips here of 2 weeks each
A group of us went to the Mariot for a leaving brunch
